update blog_category
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, create_time, last_modify_time from blog_category

select
from blog_category inner join (select id from blog_category order by id desc limit #{offset}, #{rows}) t2 using(id)

select
from blog_category
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
